scripts.db_update: pip2 install -r db/requirements.txt; python db/update.py; python db/update-db-stamp.py;
scripts.test_generate_map_data: python tests/regional_map_tests/TESTcreateJsonData.py; python tests/regional_map_tests/TESTcreateKmlData.py; python public/data_sets/TEST_kml_files/zipkml.py; rm public/data_sets/TEST_kml_files/*.kml; python public/data_sets/TEST_map_files/zipReg.py; rm public/data_sets/TEST_map_files/*.json
scripts.generate_map_data: python util/regional_map/createJsonData.py; python util/regional_map/createKmlData.py; python public/data_sets/kml_files/zipkml.py; rm public/data_sets/kml_files/*.kml; python public/data_sets/map_files/zipReg.py; rm public/data_sets/map_files/*.json
